com.ibm.team.interop.client.rest.json
Class JSONArray

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection
      java.util.AbstractList
          java.util.ArrayList
              com.ibm.team.interop.client.rest.json.JSONArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable, java.util.Collection, java.util.List, java.util.RandomAccess
public class JSONArray
extends java.util.ArrayList

Extension of ArrayList that only allows values which are JSON-able. See JSONObject for a list of valid values. Instances of this class are not thread-safe.

See Also:
Serialized Form
